channel.title: Java on vista
channel.description: i downloaded java JDK 6 update 13 and it still says i dun have JDK 6, is it cuz i got vista or wat? if its cuz i got vista which java should i download in order for it to work?

item.title: Java on vista
item.dc:creator: @Gflo Gflo
item.description:
@Gflo wrote:

[quote=“bbl111, post:6, topic:276872”]Maybe use a simple one like this

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause [/quote]

I see you use 64bit vista, so do I

That will only work iv youve installed the 32 but java on your 64 bit machine

Read full topic

item.title: Java on vista
item.dc:creator: @bbl111 bbl111
item.description:
@bbl111 wrote:

Maybe use a simple one like this

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Java on vista
item.dc:creator: @Master_Chef Master Chef
item.description:
@Master_Chef wrote:

OK, simply copy my compiler below. It auto-matically sets Java environmentals and isn’t that large.

@echo off @title Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have JDK. On the web page please click the JDK 6 Update 13 download. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Compiled. pause exit

Read full topic
